name.description: Specifies the name of the IP Configuration.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the resource. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

ip_configuration.description: One or more `ip_configuration` blocks as documented below.

subnet_id.description: Reference to the subnet associated with the IP Configuration.

id.description: The ID of the Network Profile.

container_network_interface_ids.description: A list of Container Network Interface ID's.

create.description: Used when creating the Network Profile.

update.description: Used when updating the Network Profile.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Network Profile.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Network Profile.
